website_summaries.verdict: Not a lot of complaints were listed on the Mizuno Wave Inspire 14. In fact, many people liked this iteration in the long-running series. They claimed that it shielded their feet, knees and back from discomfort. They also welcomed this stability shoe’s lightweight nature and trendy color schemes. There were complaints about the fit being too narrow, but they weren’t a lot of people who felt that way.
pros: Most testers lauded the general quality of the materials used for the Mizuno Wave Inspire 14
Heel strikers welcomed the shock attenuating platform of this running shoe
The midsole helped some runners in preventing knee and back pain during activities
Some purchasers appreciated the stability features in the midsole, stating that it suitably corrected their stance
Those who had plantar fasciitis claimed that the combination of technologies in the midsole helped in staving off their discomfort
The color schemes gained the favor of some shoe enthusiasts
A few consumers noted that the Inspire 14 was lightweight
cons: Several testers felt that it was too narrow around the toe box

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Inspire 14 Running Shoe,...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the Inspire 13 fit and the support it provided on my runs. I will need a new shoe shortly and with a marathon coming up in October, was looking for the same pair as I currently have so I could break them in in time. I ordered this running shoe ( the Wave Inspire 14) because I was not able to find the version 13s. I took these Inspire 14s for one run so far (6 miles) and was happy with the support, room in the toe box and the overall fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe got a little breathable
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno has done it again, my favorite running shoe got just a little bit better this year. I'm always apprehensive when there is a redesign of this magnitude but after a slight initial discomfort in the inner arch area the shoes performed as advertised. The redesigned upper material was more breathable and I noticed a marked decrease in the amount of sweat build up in my socks compared to the Wave Inspire 13's.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmrunner

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have had every model of the same model shoe starting at the Wave Inspire 8, they all have fit as they should and they wear ‘average’. I run 12-18 miles a week and use them on an elliptical or bike as well as General weight lifting 5-6 days a week and can usually get 6-8 months out of them. The 13’s and 14’s soles last longer than the previous versions but not as long as the pairs of Saucony’s I have had at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: torsten palm

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the best feeling pairs of shoes I have had
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best feeling pairs of shoes I have had. I have very flat feet from the military, and the arch support and heel cushion is great. I felt like I was running on clouds. I will note they are slightly heavy for what I'm used to. I also have slightly wide feet. I usually get wide shoes for companies like Under Armour and Nike, but the shoes fit me perfect with the regular width.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Finally mizuno made this model shoe perfect all around
customer_reviews.text: Finally mizuno made this model shoe perfect all around. I always found problems with prior models before with heel support. One of them gave me plantar fasciitis. I think I wore them too long but I got another model (believe I had 11 and 12) and the heel support sucked again. I knew these shoes where close to perfection and this specific model is amazing. Most comfy running shoe ive ever had. Glad they got a new designer as well, they dont look as dumb..
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: 2018 model 15% less ugly than previous versions. Otherwise ...
customer_reviews.text: 2018 model 15% less ugly than previous versions. Otherwise feels the same as my 2016's. Shin-splint free (with orange superfeet inserts) so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Munz

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my son and he has been very pleased with them. He had injured his foot and had been suffering and felt he need a shoe with more support. I think for the first time since his injury, he was able to walk without discomfort. It was a very good purchase and he is very happy with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: cva

customer_reviews.title: They do well
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 4th set of the Wave Inspire series. They work very well for me. Large toe box, great neutral landing, and supportive as you'd expect. I tend to be a little rough on my shoes, a typical jogging shoe lasts me about 250 miles, these don't quite make it that long. I can usually get ~220 miles before they're falling apart in the heel. They feel good for the time I have them though so I'll definitely keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for a runner who probates and has wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno Wave Inspire sneakers are the only thing my husband will wear for running. He has wide feet and is a pronator. The sneakers keep his body aligned reducing the stress on his back. I highly recommend these sneakers. Also I really commend Amazon on their quick delivery service including in the prime membership. You can’t beat a two day delivery. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie DeMatto

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Mizuno rejects.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the identical brand and size I purchased from our local running store. Every time I even walk (other than a causal walk) I develop a blister on my right heel. I purchased another pair from the running store and as with the first pair I have zero problems. I’ve broken these shoes in by wearing when not exercising but if I walk much distance I develop the blister on the right heel. I can detect a small ridge in the right shoe in the problem area. These were slightly cheaper than those from the running store but was a huge mistake. Very poor quality and apparently are seconds. I only wish a negative star rating was available.
customer_reviews.author: brendaJ

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my elderly dad with stability issues on the recommendation from a PT. He barely uses them but normal wear and tear created a huge hole in the top of the show, in the mesh part. He barely wore them and certainly did not run in them - given the price and the other reviews, would have thought they could hold up to a 78 year old wearing them every few days for a few hours. Amazon return window over so we are stuck with them I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MD NY

customer_reviews.title: Nicely build and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after researching a bit about durability. I've been wearing Brooks Glycerins for some time but recently they've been wearing through the outsole in just 30 or 40 days. I decided to give these a try since they are supposed to be more durable. They are a bit stiffer and less padded than the Glycerins but that's to be expected as the materials are more firm and rugged. I've walked over 30 miles in them this week already and my feet have already adjusted and they feel great. I'll report back after I've had them for a couple to three months.
customer_reviews.author: M.Buechler

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 15, flat footed, just starting to exercise at lunch at work and needed a good walking shoe. The built in arch support is nice, however I assume my feet are still adjusting to the shoes as my arches will start burning a 1/4 mile in and the feeling usually subsided by a mile and a 1/2. So far I love the shoes and will definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Groleau

customer_reviews.title: Good Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's running style is different, but this is an excellent shoe for me. A lot of good heel cushioning for heel to toe runners.
customer_reviews.author: LA Nichols

customer_reviews.title: comfy sole
customer_reviews.text: These were great for walking or running on, and the toe box was great. But, from the arch back was snug, a little too snug. Felt like a head ache for my feet. Such a relief to take them off. I might have needed to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by a friend who like me needs a shoe with arch support. I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable they were right out of the box. Wore them all day and my feet didn’t hurt and it didn’t feel like I needed to break them in. I’d definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Jason Creppel

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband who has large, wide foot. Said they fit well and are very comfortable. The only downfall i see is that apparently these are not machine washable. Would not have bought had I known. Maybe that’s just a liability warning...not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Husain

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have run in Wave Inspires since somewhere around version 8. I have always liked them for their light weight and good fit to my narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Have been wearing Mizuno shoes for several years I do ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing Mizuno shoes for several years I do not run but I ware them for everyday I have not found a replacement for them yet
customer_reviews.author: Don Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love this sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, had so many issues with plantar pain, the higher arch made it so much better pain is gone !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: I. FILGUEIRAS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had to change my review. Ordered theses on May 3...now on Jun 13 there is a tear on the bottom... I ran on the treadmill 95% of the time. No way they should be tearing already
customer_reviews.author: Andre J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing Mizuno Wave Inspires for years and I stick with what works. They take my costum orthotics every time (since they cost way more than the shoes) and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: First time I have purchased Mizuno shoes and have been very impressed. Very comfortable and offers great support which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: 4th pair of the Mizuno Wave Inspire... fit great and sizes are as expected. They are great for my actuve lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and as described. I have used this brand and style of running shoe for years and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these running shoes. I had the previous gens and never fail
customer_reviews.author: Nicky G.

customer_reviews.title: After Wave Inspire 9 this is the one( wave inspire 14) I liked. In between I tried Brooks Trasend
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. After Wave Inspire 9 this is the one( wave inspire 14) I liked. In between I tried Brooks Trasend, Asics Gel Kayon 21, 24. But like Mizuno over all of them.
customer_reviews.author: ANAKAY

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes by Mizhuno
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light running shoes. Excellent cushioning, stability, support and breathability.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Torn after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: They are very expensive and didn't last for more than 5 months. For the price I paid, they are not durable and I wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: charan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reliable, I love these
customer_reviews.text: A pair of excellent running shoes. They're comfortable, like walking on clouds, and when running, they help alleviate the pounding of the feet on the surface. Between all I've said and the selection in colors, I'm glad I bought these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I actually received a 1/2 size larger than ordered. Worked out perfect, as that was the size I needed..YMMV...I wear 11 1/2 US street/dress shoes, so I always order a 1/2 size up for running which in this case would've been too small for me. Good shoe, Clydesdale support.
customer_reviews.author: Edgeryder

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pro runner. I purchased these shoes cuz I’ve had Mizuno before. I’ve enjoyed them so far. Everything is just as advertised. Good job Mizuno, as always!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: before have saucony guide 10 with drop 8mm but this is a good shoes confortable for marathon and less
customer_reviews.text: may be the 12 mm drop is too much for me, before have saucony guide 10 with drop 8mm but this is a good shoes confortable for marathon and less. For end, design and colors looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: frederic totain

customer_reviews.title: Running on clouds.
customer_reviews.text: For runners with wide feet. Feels like running on a cloud. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: niro

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 10, 11, 12 and 13 versions
customer_reviews.text: Used these shoes for years and the 14 was the first one that gave me blisters and did not fit as smoothly as the rest. Others have all done 400+ miles and this one has done 7 runs of 3 to 6 miles each and had an issue each time. I have worked at it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Just wish Mizuno made more color combinations available in the wide size.
customer_reviews.author: wengy

customer_reviews.title: Running on Muzino since Inspire 9
customer_reviews.text: Better toe box fit, lighter weights then the 13 inspire and new sole material that seems to hold up better
customer_reviews.author: EHahn

customer_reviews.title: Great walking/running shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking and running, good support, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PMK

customer_reviews.title: I think these are the best running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have run many marathons and these have always been my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C. Nannarello

customer_reviews.title: best choice
customer_reviews.text: very comfort and nice response. You would know Mizuno. yeh it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dae-il Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality Shoe for running or walking.
customer_reviews.text: very good shoe it seems to fit a little tight but that is not unusual for new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: corollalit

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but these are amazing workout shoes for guys like me over 6 feet and right at 200lbs. Great support and stability. Best running/walking shoes I've bought in years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for running and the toe box is great!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Doing a lot of walking in these. Like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Plenty of shock absorption. High quality. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I have been wearing the wave inspire line for years and have never been disappointed. Its the only shoe I have found that doesnt make my back and knees hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Herriman

customer_reviews.title: Quick overview of Mizuno Men's Wave Inspire 14 Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seem a little tight in the mid-part of the shoe...fit or my foot. Using them for the MCM Marathon.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and it fits better than the Rider for my needs - I have flat feet. They are very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for several months and they wear well. Good fit and support.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Post

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, I am sure it is good to run in. But the shoe is just so narrow. Much narrower than my current Saucony's in the same size. They are so narrow it hurt just to walk around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal. I'm in very austere conditions so I need a shoe that can hold up to the dust and rock. Perfect running shoe for when I'm not in boots
customer_reviews.author: Elijah tuten

customer_reviews.title: Counterfit product
customer_reviews.text: Wrong materials, wrong weight, wrong wrapping paper, wrong laces, poor fit and finish, spelling mistakes on the labels, definitely counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: don't buy counterfeit

customer_reviews.title: like me, these are the best
customer_reviews.text: If you have weak ankles, like me, these are the best. The. Best. Sturdy enough for city running. This is my third pair and they never disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J Greco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product exclusively for run. Very comfortable. The product arrived 1 day before expected. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've had. Great Stability. Lots of room in toe box and great for running.
customer_reviews.author: anthony c. gilbert

customer_reviews.title: ... wave inspire line for years and have never been disappointed. Plenty of shock absorption
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the wave inspire line for years and have never been disappointed. Plenty of shock absorption. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno makes great shoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for walking and running, very good support, and I get compliments all the time !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Connell

customer_reviews.title: Light, good fitting, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Light, Good fitting, comfortable shoe. But it takes a little bit to break in though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The most important feature it's hard to say the style the color the material it's just simply great
customer_reviews.text: Well these wave inspire 14 shoes are excellent Mizuno certainly knows shoes .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Supportive and comfortable shoe. Great quality like other Mizuno shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Mizuno Wave Inspire has been my prefered shoe for more than 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Still running

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I work on concrete and they have great cushion in them!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Henson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: My upper foot, just below the toes became irritated and began to blister after my first run. I've owned many pairs of running shoes and that was a first.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfort and breathability
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable, breathe well, and are lighter than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after less than 5 months of wear.
customer_reviews.text: Had them for less than 5 months and they were already falling apart. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great product great experience
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes... Will probably be ordering some more soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great heal support
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Very comfortable and great heal support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno is the best running shoes you can imagine
customer_reviews.text: 10 years of running with Mizuno, the best running shoes ever
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hantcis

customer_reviews.title: Beware of second hand merchandise
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were used. The soles and insoles were dirty. These were NOT new.
customer_reviews.author: na

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: they fit right and makes my runs less stressful on my knees
customer_reviews.author: Gus Mantilla

customer_reviews.title: Minor improvements from previous model, still a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best line of stability shoes on the market. Seem to have made minor aesthetic improvements to the shoe, but overall fits and feels the same as the Inspire 13.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Shoes where good but one thing did not come with laces
customer_reviews.text: Shoes where good but one thing did not come with laces. Seemed like they would have checked box before sending!
customer_reviews.author: ant

customer_reviews.title: Japs make a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. These fit as well as Asics, better support in the arch and all around more durable.. Never going back. Mizuno rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love theses shoes. This is the third time I have bought Mizuno Wave Inspire shoes and they work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Inspire 14 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: From first to last step, runners seeking guidance will find a smooth and supportive ride in the latest version of this category leader. Our new cloud Wave technology combined with our traditional Wave “fan shaped” support design delivers the cushioned, responsive, and stable ride.
feature_bullets: Cloudwave offers a soft stable and lively lightweight feel
Fit in motion upper for flexible support
Soft anatomical sockliner for extra arch support and cushioning
